Entries.default:
<ispeech>You followed me into the abyss? Have you so little respect for the scant years your fragile form affords you?</ispeech>

The dragon growls through sword-like teeth, yet the meaning behind the sounds rings within your mind.
<ispeech>I know not why the shortsightedness of kith continues to surprise me.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Leave while the option remains, lest you be bound here as I am.</ispeech>
<ispeech>But know that within its depths do all things encounter their endings.</ispeech>
<ispeech>I imagine so.</ispeech>
"What are you?"
"You're not trapped here. You just attacked Harbingers' Watch."
"I won't let you kill anyone else!"
"You'll feel a lot less trapped after I kill you. Again."
"According to Rymrgand, you died when you entered this place."
<ispeech>Circumstance does not afford me time to address ridiculous queries.</ispeech>
<ispeech>I delivered unto the believers the oblivion that they desired. You object that I answer their prayers?</ispeech>
<ispeech>It matters not. I require souls. I had very nearly accumulated an adequate amount for my purpose, but your intercession necessitated I expend much.</ispeech>
<ispeech>In the final accounting, the culling that follows shall be upon your ledger.</ispeech>
<ispeech>A simple understanding of a complex situation.</ispeech>
<ispeech>No.</ispeech>
<ispeech>I smell the blood of Scyorielaphas upon you.</ispeech>
<ispeech> Do you make a habit of inflicting yourself upon your betters?</ispeech>
<ispeech>Do you believe your work righteous?</ispeech>
<ispeech>I smell the blood of Sefyra upon you.</ispeech>
"I kill only those I must to help those who need it."
"Maybe not, but the work pays."
"It's certainly enjoyable."
"That's for the gods to judge."
"Then help me understand."
"I'm not interested in your petty self-justification."
"Seems pretty straightforward to me."
"Maybe. But you look like a monster, and killing monsters is what I do."
[Say nothing.]
<ispeech>Nor I in justifying myself.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Doubtlessly without bias.</ispeech>
<ispeech>You will find little below. Less that you can take with you.</ispeech>
The great reptile's head cranes to the right, turning a glowing eye upon you. A snort flares her nostrils.
<ispeech>I smell the blood of Jadaferlas upon you.</ispeech>
<ispeech>I bear responsibility for neither your enlightenment nor your sophistication.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Perhaps, magician.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Descend into the Void or do not. I care neither way.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Eventually. First, however, I must attend to my unfettering.</ispeech>

The beast snorts repeatedly, a low growl rumbling within its long throat.

It's laughing.
<ispeech>Your self-appointed divinities merit no such authority.</ispeech>
"Now there Captain Watcher, you wouldn't want to go giving the big beastie the right idea about you."
<ispeech>None here require your assistance. Nor will any benefit from it.</ispeech>
She casts her eyes upward, thinking, and moves her head in a way that vacillates between nodding and shaking.
"Well. Sometimes. I mean, there's always some unexpected killing, right? What about all those bears who weren't asking for any trouble?"
"You have stayed your hand in situations where many would not have."
"Hel, they got more right to it than some half-rotted lizard."
"Hey, was that an insult?"
<ispeech>The words of your dead oxen god concern me not.</ispeech>
